author: Gino D'Acampo
method: Preheat the oven to 200C/400F/Gas 6. Heat one tablespoon of the olive oil in a frying pan and fry the garlic for one minute. Add the spinach and cook for 2-3 minutes, or until just wilted. Season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper. Place the mushrooms stalk-side up on a baking sheet and drizzle each one with a tablespoon of olive oil. Divide the spinach between the two mushrooms and top with the grated cheese. Bake in the oven for 3-4 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and golden-brown. To serve, place each mushroom onto a small serving plate.
ingredients: 3 tbsp olive oil,  1 garlic clove,  100g/3Â½oz spinach, washed,  salt and freshly ground black pepper ,  2 large flat mushrooms,  55g/2oz cheddar, grated
